item.title: Recycled Laptop Usb Camera
item.description: for a little side project, i needed small usb cams, preferably for free. i still had old hp elitebooks 8440p, and from their display, i removed the camera, see the picture below. the picture shows always the pinout. next, i soldered the 4 cables together, leaving the GPIO pin unused. no big deal, there is no faster way to get an usb-cam for raspberry and co. laptop cam connector Type-A pinout Pin Name Wire color Description 1 V(Bus) Red +5 V 2 D- White Data- 3 D+ Green Data+ 4 GND Black Ground Â soldered with standard usb cable
